createNewMatch

@RequestMapping(value="/createNewMatch",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String createNewMatch(@RequestParam(value="uid")
                                                      int userID,
                                                      org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model)
Function createNewMatch

Parameters:
userID - = the id of the user that issues the command to create the match.
Returns:
a JSON object containing the new matches details, such as bag, color, players, etc Postcondition: This user will be given a new bag, assigned a color for this game, have this bag get added to the user's bag list, have this match get added to the user;

                                                      org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model)
Function getMatchesLost

Parameters:
userID - - the id of the user for which all the matches lost are being pulled.
model - - the mdoel object as used by the JSONView
Returns:
the JSON containing the details of the matches lost by the user in the given user ID.

loadMatch

@RequestMapping(value="/loadMatch",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String loadMatch(@RequestParam(value="mid")
                                                 int matchID,
                                                 org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model)
Function loadMatch

Parameters:
matchID - - the id for the match that is being loaded.
model - - the model used to display the View;
Returns:
the JSON of the match information. Information includes: users involved, colors of users, bags involved, current spelling, Letters left to be played, users turn etc.

resignFromMatch

@RequestMapping(value="/resignFromMatch",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String resignFromMatch(@RequestParam(value="uid")
                                                       int userID,
                                                       @RequestParam(value="mid")
                                                       int matchID,
                                                       org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model)
Function resignFromMatch

Parameters:
userID - - the id of the user who is resigning from the match
matchID - - the id of the match that the user is resigning from
model - - the model object that is used to display the JSON View
Returns:
the details of the match that the user has resigned from in its new state and condition.

                                                        org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model)
Function getActiveMatches

Parameters:
userID - - the id of the user for which all the active matches are being drawn.
model - - the model object used to display the JSONView and output the data.
Returns:
the JSON of all the active matches for the given user.
